dialogue.speaker: MAX
dialogue.text: Dino Velvet... yeah, he's like the John Luc Godard of S+M flicks, supposed to be a real weirdo.

dialogue.speaker: WELLES
dialogue.text: A weirdo making S+M films?  Who'd have thought it?

dialogue.speaker: MAX
dialogue.text: His stuff comes out of New York. Bondage and fetish videos, Gothic Hardcore.  Definitely not for the squeamish.

dialogue.speaker: MAX
dialogue.text: Out of the back of bondage magazines mostly, but you can find it on the street if you look.  He'll also do commissions, for enough money...

dialogue.speaker: MAX
dialogue.text: Nothing illegal, it's always borderline.  Like if some freak wants to see a transvestite in a full rubber immersion suit getting an enema from a...

dialogue.speaker: MAX
dialogue.text: He cuts all kinds of other stuff into his movies; photographs, newsreel footage, subliminal images. Thinks he's making art.

dialogue.speaker: WELLES
dialogue.text: Well, I'm in New York now.  What do you say to flying out and giving me a hand?

dialogue.speaker: WELLES
dialogue.text: Take a vacation.  I'll pay you four hundred a day, plus expenses.

dialogue.speaker: MAX
dialogue.text: You want me to come out there and play private eye?

dialogue.speaker: WELLES
dialogue.text: Consider it.  Meanwhile, dig up whatever Dino Velvet films you can. Get receipts.  I'll call back.
